channel.title: Donor Weapon
channel.description: Donors get to have a 1 hit k0 sword on my server. How can I make the swords unusable in wild? You can also wear another weapon, attack someone, then wield the 1 hit k0 sword, how can I fix that?

item.title: Donor Weapon

item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

Donors get to have a 1 hit k0 sword on my server. How can I make the swords unusable in wild? You can also wear another weapon, attack someone, then wield the 1 hit k0 sword, how can I fix that?
